Host a zero-waste wedding by providing reusable or compostable plates, cups, and utensils, using local and organic food sources, and reducing single-use plastics.
Encourage guests to carpool or take public transportation to the ceremony and reception by providing shuttle services or offering incentives for those who do.
Decorate the venue with natural elements such as flowers, leaves, and branches, rather than synthetic materials.
Use LED lights instead of traditional bulbs to reduce energy consumption and carbon emissions.
Have a portion of the budget dedicated to planting trees or supporting conservation efforts in the area.
